name: One Night At Doge's
description:
• Instructions - Just close the doors for whatever hall they're in, for Dabbing Chica close both doors. Restart the game if you get jumpscared.
  • Lore - Welcome to Doge's Pizzeria. You're our new Nightguard. One thing to be aware of is that the animatronics tend to move around a lot. We think this may be due to the fact that they used to have a roaming mode back in the old pizzeria.
